description:
Enjoy the Classic D&D games now update to work with newer hardware!


This torrent has all the CLASSIC Infinity Engine games plus all the expansions:

-Baldur&#039;s Gate 1
Tales of the Sword Coast(Expansion)

-Baldur&#039;s Gate 2
Throne of Bhaal(Expansion)

-Icewind Dale
Heart of Winter(Expansion)
Trials of the Luremaster(Web Add-on)

-Icewind Dale 2

-Planescape: Torment


Additionally it has:

-Instructions on getting all the games up-to-date plus all the required files.

-Mod made by the community to play Baldur&#039;s Gate 1 on Baldur&#039;s gate 2 updated engine plus explanations on how to install.

-Widescreen Mod made by the community to play the games on newer widescreen monitors at crisp resolution without any stretching. Plus instructions.



It took me many many hours to get all the files and figure out how to install everything. Now everything is together in one convenient torrent. Enjoy!

(ps this games are great to play on your notebook :))
